response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is estimated to be worth $1,500,000 based on its unique features and market positioning. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality products. We believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with an excellent investment opportunity. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
